page.title: 19THE OTTER VALLEY
page.content: { The River Otter}flows through this block. It is popular for fishing and as a place for artists to paint. Herons,kingfishers and woodpeckers are among the birds that can be seen near the river. Near the Church is a large rookery. Here you can find the weir that provides water for the Mill leat. This still works and the{Mill}is very active. There is a footpath all along the river bank and many people enjoy walking in this beautiful area. There is an{Otter Valley Association whose aims are to protect the beauties and amenities of this area. It is widely supported by the retired population of the E. Devon area.
